entities.name: puzzled but interested
entities.description: The class's mood as they got up from their seats.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: A teacher who led the class out of the classroom. He was smiling when Peeves sang a song about him.

entities.name: peeves the poltergeist
entities.description: A mischievous poltergeist who was floating upside down in midair and stuffing a keyhole with chewing gum. He sang a song about Professor Lupin.

relationships.description: Peeves sang a song about Professor Lupin, addressing him as 'Loony, loopy Lupin'.
Despite Peeves' rude behavior and song about him, Professor Lupin remained smiling.
